put.description: Update information about a specific notification according to the entered parameters

delete.description: Update information about a specific notification

put.description: Updates a section in the current project

post.description: Creates notification in accordance with the entered parameters

get.description: Returns all notifications in the current section

put.description: Updates a specific project according to the entered parameters and returns all owned projects

delete.description: Deletes a specific project and returns all owned projects

post.description: Adds a collaborator to the current project and returns all collaborators of this project

delete.description: Removes a collaborator from the current project and returns all collaborators of this project

get.description: Returns all collaborators of the project

post.description: Creates a section in the project

get.description: Returns all sections of the current project
Returns the last six projects by last edit time
Allows the manager to view undelivered notifications
